Title: Valid User Registration
Steps: Prepare a valid request body with all required fields | Send a POST request to /api/v1/users/register | Check the response status
Expected: Response status should be 201 Created and contain userId and authToken

Title: Duplicate Email Registration
Steps: Prepare a request body with an email that already exists in the system | Send a POST request to /api/v1/users/register | Check the response status
Expected: Response status should be 409 Conflict with error message 'Email already registered'

Title: Invalid Password Registration
Steps: Prepare a request body with a password that does not meet the criteria (e.g., less than 8 characters) | Send a POST request to /api/v1/users/register | Check the response status
Expected: Response status should be 400 Bad Request with specific error details

Title: Invalid Mobile Number Registration
Steps: Prepare a request body with an invalid mobile number format | Send a POST request to /api/v1/users/register | Check the response status
Expected: Response status should be 400 Bad Request with error details about mobile number format

Title: Rate Limiting Exceeded
Steps: Send 6 registration requests from the same IP within an hour | Check the response status of the 6th request
Expected: Response status should be 429 Too Many Requests
